上.memoRead: Shang like the dragon, descending on you

不.memoMean: Also character for down in japanese -> means negation
不.memoRead: tone goes down, like the alternate meaning of the character

也.memoRead: Tone is enthusiastic, yeah I am also coming!

乾.memoRead: Tone is flat because dry is boring

京.memoMean: The big heads live in the capital

亮.memoMean: A capital on legs? Such a modern capital should be very CLEAN

人.memoRead: tone goes up, like the character looks like an up arrow

什.memoMean: A leader and a cross... WHAT is he going to do with it?
什.memoRead: He is going UP the cross, of course

份.memoMean: The leader of parts is a part, a CLASSIFIER

你.memoRead: Tone is happy because it is you should speak to others with respect

便.memoMean: Things the leader uses have to be very CONVENIENT

個.memoMean: Leader solid: there can only be one solid leader, that is, one at a time.
個.memoRead: If the leader falls down, only then a new leader might take his place

們.memoMean: Leader at the gate: he is waiting for his comrades to come
們.memoRead: His comrades are men, just as in english, without the accent

倫.memoMean: Leader with a fancy hat and bookshelf: he represents ORDER
倫.memoRead: Where do you want order? In LUNdunium.

兩.memoMean: Two entrances are a pair of entrances
兩.memoRead: Having two entrances to choose from makes you very happy.

公.memoMean: An arm is hitting a bowl! What is it? It is a PUBLIC gong!
公.memoRead: A public gong is a boring GONG

再.memoRead: Tone goes down because we don't really want to do it again

分.memoRead: One boring minute after the other

務.memoRead: Lately your waiter business has been going DOWN

勺.memoMean: This is a LADLE with a drop
勺.memoRead: This is a special SHAOlin spoon used for fighting and meditation.

包.memoMean: Wrap means wrap and often bread
包.memoRead: You happen to be in India and they only have flat bread

午.memoMean: A cow with no head only comes out at NOON

厠.memoRead: Things only go DOWN into the toilet, hopefully

叉.memoRead: You use this fork to eat tea (CHA)

口.memoRead: The best mouth is a happy mouth

叫.memoMean: A vine in your mouth makes it really difficult to shout or to call someone
叫.memoRead: You want to say "chao" but because of the vines you can only say "jiao". This drops your mood of course.

可.memoMean: Can a mouth be a prison? It is very much possible
可.memoRead: Tone is happy because you like your mouth being a prison for food

司.memoMean: The director is the DEPARTMENT here.
司.memoRead: Department work is of course very boring

吃.memoMean: Eat with mouth, nose and arrow: things you need to hunt and eat
吃.memoRead: Eating is boring, tone stays flat

呢.memoMean: A mouth with a spoon and a flag... that is very strange, RIGHT?

和.memoMean: Grand AND mouth, the most iconic duo
和.memoRead: Tone goes up, cause we are not done listing things yet

咖.memoMean: The things that makes you strong through your mouth is coffee.
咖.memoRead: Sound character, flat tone since you need coffee when you feel flat

咸.memoMean: The drunkard hides something under his coat... he is selling SALT!

員.memoRead: This person is a member of the YUAN dynasty

哥.memoMean: There are two mouths in prison, the upper one is the OLDER BROTHERs
哥.memoRead: Everyone older than you is boring

哪.memoMean: Seems like there, but with a mouth. The mouth keeps asking questions like WHERE, HOW, WHICH?
哪.memoRead: At least it is happy with the answer

商.memoRead: The merchant job, as most jobs, is boring.

啡.memoMean: What is extreme in your mouth? Coffee!
啡.memoRead: Tone is flat like how you feel before your coffee

啤.memoMean: What lowly things do you put in your mouth? It is beer of course!
啤.memoRead: Tone goes up cause beer makes you pretty hype

嗎.memoMean: Does a horse have a mouth? The most basic question of all time.
嗎.memoRead: No tone as this is just a support tag

國.memoMean: King or a drunk in box: these two kind of people can lead countries
國.memoRead: The memonic will go up just like your countries future!

園.memoMean: Something in a square... the square is the PARK.
園.memoRead: You get up early to go to the park I guess.

堡.memoMean: The leader person on a hill sits in a CASTLE
堡.memoRead: The leader is very happy in his castle, to say the least

多.memoMean: Two bows might be not a lot but it is MANY compared to one bow.
多.memoRead: This is the duo of two bows. Actually dual wielding bows is pretty boring

大.memoRead: Once you are big you can only FALL.

天.memoRead: TIAN as the god of heaven in Chinese mythology

太.memoMean: This character look VERY much like the dog one
太.memoRead: It is too much! Tone it DOWN!

奶.memoMean: A woman of the stairs is a GRANDMOTHER, as she spends most of her time climbing stairs.

好.memoMean: Women and children are the keys to happiness
好.memoRead: Happy tone cause good things make happy

妹.memoMean: The rocket woman is your YOUNGER SISTER. Young kids tend to be very energetic.
妹.memoRead: Younger people usually have a falling tone, as you have to look down on them

媽.memoMean: A mother horse is a mother of all horses
媽.memoRead: Your mother, as all older members of your family, is very boring

字.memoMean: A student with a simple cap is a junior, he is only learning characters
字.memoRead: Tone goes down because learning characters is boring for a kid

學.memoMean: The student with a fancy hat is a senior who knows how to study
學.memoRead: Tone goes up like your grades when you study

宜.memoMean: A hat on top of a top hat is very PROPER

家.memoMean: A pig under a roof represents a house or a HOME!
家.memoRead: Your house happens to have a FLAT roof.

寫.memoMean: A sitting person (or a sitting monster) in a cap is sitting down so he can write characters
寫.memoRead: Tone goes up and down just like your hand when writing

少.memoMean: Small things are actually just small cause they have FEW atoms.

師.memoMean: The man with the glasses is the TEACHER of course
師.memoRead: This teacher is great but very BORING.

常.memoRead: CHANG is a common name in China

年.memoRead: Nian is like tian, also the counter of years always go UP.

幹.memoMean: Dry and CLEAN seems to be the same thing here

幾.memoMean: Two poo on a chair is HOW MANY? Well, two. In simply it is only the chair.
幾.memoRead: You are actually happy this second chair has nothing on it.

床.memoMean: A tree under a canopy makes an excellent BED
床.memoRead: You can do a lot of things on a bed, in this case you get UP from one.

店.memoMean: Fortune under a roof means a store of course
店.memoRead: Tone goes down since you profits are also going down in this recession.

弟.memoRead: Younger people usually have a falling tone, as you have to look down on them

很.memoMean: The good loitering IS a modifier here
很.memoRead: What loiters the most? A happy HEN

後.memoRead: My respect for you will go down if you talk behind my back

快.memoMean: Spirit + english looking thing = english people are famously fast and quick.
快.memoRead: They are especially fast to duck down.

想.memoMean: You heart is thinking about what is misses: the trees and the sun! In other words, you miss the forest!
想.memoRead: You tone is happy when thinking about your beloved forest

愛.memoRead: Tone goes down because you fall in love.

我.memoRead: Tone is happy because you actually like yourself

所.memoMean: There is only one PLACE with two axes.
所.memoRead: This particular place is SUOmi (Finland), a particularly HAPPY place. No thanks to all the axe wielding warriors.

拉.memoMean: With your fingers you PULL down the standing thing

敦.memoMean: Since it winter, you give the little chid a hat. That is how KINDHEARTED you are.
敦.memoRead: DUN, DUN, DUN is the sound of your kind heart beating.

日.memoRead: No matter when, the sun is alwats going DOWN somewhere.

早.memoRead: Happy in the morning like in the evening

星.memoMean: The sun lives its life as a STAR
星.memoRead: The life of a star is boring though.

是.memoMean: The most concrete thing to exist is the sun
是.memoRead: Tone is falling just like the sun does every day

月.memoRead: Similar to the sun, the moon is also always going down (somewhere)

有.memoRead: You are happy because you like having things.

服.memoRead: You take UP the clothes to become a waiter

期.memoMean: Crab moon: this world has a crab for a moon and we measure weeks by how fast the crab crawls around the planet
期.memoRead: The crab uses its QI to stay afloat. Nice and flat in the water.

杯.memoMean: Tree not: Don't make a cup out of a tree, its too old school

果.memoRead: Tone is happy because you love fruit

校.memoMean: Public tree... is where kids were used to be teached, a SCHOOL of sorts
校.memoRead: They all sat down under the tree

樂.memoMean: The man who can throw lighting from his hands is very happy about it
樂.memoRead: Tone goes down cause no one else is

樹.memoRead: You tone goes down because the samurai standing mouth tree is very creepy

機.memoMean: How to make a tree into a table? With machines of course

檬.memoMean: The tree the pigs love to eat from is the LEMON tree

歡.memoMean: A man with a little big eyes turkey: they are both very happy.
歡.memoRead: The man is actuall Don Huan, a very boring man (flat tone)

歲.memoMean: Stop, you drunk! You are not OLD enough to drink!

水.memoRead: You twist it because water twists and flows

汁.memoMean: What is the cross sweating? It is sweating juice of course!
汁.memoRead: Tone is flat because you are not sure you are into this kind of juice

沒.memoMean: Even though this looks like some sort of anvil that is throwing sparks it is NOT it.
沒.memoRead: The UP to not having things is more space I guess.

沙.memoRead: Is there anything more boring than sand? Don't think so

海.memoMean: Our wet mother is the SEA.

淨.memoMean: Water and a mop... you use these to CLEAN
淨.memoRead: You clean all of beiJING this way.

湯.memoMean: SOUP is basically just HOT WATER

漂.memoMean: That is a lifeboat that FLOATs on water

漢.memoMean: Happy man or happy stool means chinese
漢.memoRead: The tone falls like the Han dynasty did

澡.memoMean: You use the tree syrup to take a BATH
澡.memoRead: You take a happy morning (ZAO) bath

熱.memoMean: Heating those nine things makes HEAT
熱.memoRead: It is too hot! Turn DOWN the heating!

爸.memoMean: The father on a bed is your father. He is pretty tired, you know!
爸.memoRead: Everything your father gets home he just throws himself DOWN on the bed.

爺.memoMean: A dad with big ears and big nose can only be a GRANDFATHER (those keep growing forever)
爺.memoRead: Grandpa is old but his mood is always up

牛.memoRead: Tone goes up because cows bring great fortune to those who can affort them

狗.memoMean: An animal in a prison? It is a dog in his cage, sadly.
狗.memoRead: Tone is happy because dogs are great!

現.memoMean: The king you can see is the CURRENT king

瓜.memoMean: A strange hand reaches out of the tent, asking for a melon.
瓜.memoRead: It makes a gua sounds! It is a hungry baby!

瓶.memoRead: You can also use a bottle to play PING-pong

生.memoRead: Sheng like Sheng the dragon or something? Also he is a boring dragon.

的.memoMean: This can only be the white spoon OF... the emperor of course.

睡.memoMean: You shut your many eyes on an axis to SLEEP

碗.memoMean: That stone container with a lid is a bowl
碗.memoRead: This bowl is a happy bowl, because it contains food

米.memoRead: Like most foods, this is happy too

約.memoMean: The broom has a PACT and an APPOINTMENT with the ladle
約.memoRead: They made their pack under the full moon (YUE)

紅.memoMean: What do we spread on contruction sites? Crimson paint to protect from the ghosts
紅.memoRead: Tone goes up because you also have to loudly chant.

美.memoRead: Tone is happy because beauty makes us happy

船.memoMean: A ship with lead and a mouth is still just a boat (I hope)
船.memoRead: The ship goes up because we are actually talking about an airship

芒.memoMean: You throw two crosses into a pot, why? You are making mango soup and wooden crosses make it taste much better!
芒.memoRead: Tone goes up like your mood from mango soup

苦.memoRead: You are happy to be bitter

英.memoRead: Flat because english is a boring language

茶.memoRead: Tone goes up like your mood from drinking tea

菠.memoMean: He sweat while shaking two crosses: it because he has to eat spinach!
菠.memoRead: He also booes as much as he can. Really not a fan.

藍.memoMean: This would be indigo in Japanese but here is blue for some reason
藍.memoRead: When driving in Asia, always stay in the blue LAN (lane). Very important!

蘋.memoMean: A walking geoduck with two crosses... a man a kimono with two crosses... they are playing a game with apples and crosses.
蘋.memoRead: The game is ping-pong, which kind of makes sense at least

蘿.memoMean: A turkey with a broom and a strange face... this one is called the radish turkey.
蘿.memoRead: He makes a chichen like sound luó luó every morning

號.memoMean: A strange tiger on a chair and a desk... this is the DAY tiger. Sitting there counting days is his job.
號.memoRead: He is actually counting backwards, counting DOWN. Why? It's cultural.

蛋.memoMean: The only thing an insect would use a coat rack for is to hold it's eggs.
蛋.memoRead: The eggs keep falling DOWN. No surprise there.

行.memoRead: Where you go? UP UP UP!

裏.memoRead: Who is inside? Happy Jet Li.

西.memoRead: When you open this "west" bottle it makes a xi sound... that is because of the carbon.

要.memoMean: The woman who has a helicopter must be very IMPORTANT
要.memoRead: You will see her when the helicopter come DOWN to land

見.memoRead: Tone goes down because you need to look down if you want to see things

覺.memoMean: Your head is full of X-s, all of them respresenting dreams. You SLEEP.

語.memoMean: Say what the five mouths are: the are languages, the five big in the world
語.memoRead: Who is using those languages? You do! Happily so!

說.memoMean: Talk to you brother. Talk to him!
說.memoRead: Talking to your brother is actually really boring.

誰.memoMean: Say turkey? Say WHO? Which turkey?

買.memoMean: Full shelf for buy: the simplified version is the empty shelf version.
買.memoRead: You see most of your stuff in May. It is a happy month for you.

起.memoMean: You start running yourself when you GET UP.

超.memoRead: Chao bella, says the super italian postman.

近.memoMean: An axe on a scooter... you better not get CLOSE
近.memoRead: The is actually a JIN inside the axe, and if you rub it stuff will go down.

這.memoMean: A word on a scooter... if you can read t you must be so close you would refer to the scooter as THIS scooter.
這.memoRead: This is also the scooter you use to go downhill.

邊.memoMean: A powerful (grass) scooter... something you want by your SIDE
邊.memoRead: Even if powerful, scooters are still boring

那.memoMean: Two building in the distance? THOSE buildings.
那.memoRead: These building are downhill just like the way you take the scooter

都.memoMean: This character is present in BOTH Chinese and Japanese
都.memoRead: Not  all of these words represent DUO

醫.memoMean: That is a doctor with some tools and some vials... which is a normal DOCTOR

銀.memoRead: Silver is the yin to my yan, a yin that gets my profits up!

錢.memoMean: Two people jump for gold: the gold is actually money and coins.
錢.memoRead: Getting those coins will surely get their fortune up.

鐵.memoRead: What is made of iron? The (Chinese) Imperial TIE fighters!

門.memoRead: Men go through the gate, the UP the mountain.

附.memoMean: Where is the building the leader is attached to? CLOSE to the leader of course.

院.memoMean: The origin building is an INSTITUTION
院.memoRead: Did you know that the YUAN dynasty fell as an institute?

雙.memoMean: Either a PAIR of things on a stool or just a PAIR of stools
雙.memoRead: Either way, pairs of stools are boring

零.memoRead: You can only go UP from zero.

飯.memoMean: Food in a little stall with a chair: that is a nice meal
飯.memoRead: You have to sit down on the chair first though

餃.memoMean: Six fathers will surely eat DUMPLINGS

餅.memoMean: Food with lamps? That is a cake of course
餅.memoRead: Sound like bottle, buth since cakes or song the sound of hitting the ball is a bit more dull, BING. Cakes still make you happy though.

館.memoMean: The food bear... is the name of my breakfast SHOP
館.memoRead: The food bear is always very HAPPY of course

鳥.memoRead: This bird is actually half cat, so it sings like NIAO. The singing is happy though.

麵.memoMean: A strange container you put in hot water: you are just dipping noodles really. The simple version is just the container.
麵.memoRead: You dip with a DOWN movement.

麼.memoMean: Two robed man under a canopy drawing lines on the ground. WHAT are they doing?
麼.memoRead: They are thinking about nothing deep, just ME, ME, ME

點.memoMean: This is just POINT but black added to it. A black drop?
點.memoRead: This is the point when you are HAPPY

上午.memoMean: The time UP to NOON is morning

上海.memoMean: Above the sea is the city of shanghai

下午.memoMean: The time to which noon is downstream is AFTERNOON

中午.memoMean: The middle of noon is NOON

乾淨.memoMean: Dry and often cleaned means the place is clean

便宜.memoMean: Convenient and proper? That is mostly true to cheap stuff, we love cheap stuff

公司.memoMean: Public + department is a COMPANY, but not the same as office

公園.memoMean: Public park is a public... PARK

勺子.memoMean: Spoon small thing is a SPOON

厠所.memoMean: The toilet place is the toilet

叉子.memoMean: Fork small thing is a FORK

可樂.memoRead: Happy all the way since cola and all

吃飯.memoMean: Eating a MEAL is TO EAT.

商店.memoMean: A merchants store is just a STORE

多大.memoMean: Many big is a question of HOW OLD someone is

多少.memoMean: Many or few? That is the question? HOW MANY is it?
多少.memoRead: There are so many the end does not even get a tone

媽媽.memoRead: The second part has no tone

學生.memoMean: Someone with a school life is a student

弟弟.memoRead: As always, the second part has no tone

早上.memoMean: The time the morning is up is EARLY MORNING

星期一.memoMean: Star period one is the first day of the week: monday

晚上.memoMean: The time evening is up is EVENING

機場.memoMean: Machine place, in this case an AIRPORT, the machines being airplanes

洗澡.memoMean: Bath bath is a bath or a shower

漂亮.memoMean: Someone who cleanly floats must be very PRETTY

漢堡.memoMean: This is a strictly phonetic word for HAMBURGER

牛奶.memoMean: Cow milk is regular milk, as opposed to soy and other milks
牛奶.memoRead: Test if this setting works or not

現在.memoMean: The now thats is is the NOW

美國.memoMean: Beautiful country is America for some reason
美國.memoRead: This is just for testing purposes

菠蘿.memoMean: Spinach + radish = pineapple? Makes no sense because this is a phonetic word.

西瓜.memoRead: Watch out that the second character is not fruit!

起床.memoMean: Get up from bed is to GET UP

酒店.memoMean: Alcohol shop is a hotel for some reason

醫生.memoMean: Someone leader the life of medicine is a doctor

醫院.memoMean: The doctor institute is a hospital

銀行.memoMean: The place where you go for silver is the bank
銀行.memoRead: The reading is WRONG here! TODO: To be corrected

雞蛋.memoMean: Chicken + egg = chicken egg or egg.

非常.memoMean: Something that is not common must be EXTREMELY something

飯館.memoMean: The meal shop is a restaurant

餅乾.memoMean: Cake + dry: a dry cake is a COOKIE

麵包.memoMean: Noddle + wrap: a strange way to say BREAD, but essentially it is made out of the same stuff as noodles
